title: Famous Grouse
author: Famous Grouse
content: Don't you think it's too late to enter in $Doge and it's too risky ATM. I think another correction is waiting for everyone.Meanwhile, it looks as though the bull run is near and meme season isÂ  already at our door post. Which depicts coins like Shiba etcetera may likely pump.

comments.author: yazher
comments.body: Obviously Doge will become more profitable this year since Elon already finalized the deal and now he is the owner and CEO of Twitter. They are planning to make Doge a Micro payment for twitter, that's what I've read before and now they can actually make it happen. Too bad for me, all of my twitter accounts are blocked due to all of my followers are crypto users and my retweets are from crypto pages.

comments.author: cryptoaddictchie
comments.body: Not always too late if you are checking the ATH of doge. But this is a highly speculative token related to Elon. Assure that if Twitter and any good news to Elon arrived. Dogecoin always on the close to run a green candle. But the reverse could also happen if there bad news that link Elon to anything.I might be more wary on the technical side if you are on a short to medium trader.

comments.author: GreatArkansas
comments.body: Quote from: Famous Grouse on November 01, 2022, 10:28:57 AMDon't you think it's too late to enter in $Doge and it's too risky ATM. I think another correction is waiting for everyone.(....)If Dogecoin is risky, then other shitcoins that copied dogecoin are much riskier. For me, the safest is the higher market which is Dogecoin and as you can see, there is a lot of copy cat of the Dogecoin project. For me, Dogecoin is the original and I don't find it is risky at all versus other meme coins that copied the original.
